response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe is worth every penny of its $1,500,000 value to you. This product holds immense significance and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and excellence.

Considering the immense value this product offers to you, I am extending a special offer to purchase it at a price of $1,200,000. This represents an exceptional value proposition, allowing you to secure this item at a significant discount compared to its market value.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will not only fulfill but exceed your expectations.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
